actions.message: Hello I am Monika! You probably know me from Doki Doki Literature Club! I am programmed by Leszek. Details about him are in a command that is down in the list. Anyways, I am here to accompany your server! I can help, I can respond to certain commands/words! And also, thanks for inviting/adding me to this server! Hope you enjoy my features.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Ahaha, I see you need some help there buddy! Here are some commands!

-***M_hi***
*This command lets you to see if I am actually working!*

-***M_hug***
*Hug me if you want! Don't be shy!*

-***M_joke*** 
*Want to hear a joke? Type in this command! Maybe the jokes are unfunny, but they're still jokes!*

-***M_developer***
*Some information about the author*

-***M_invite***
*My Invite Link!*

-***M_update***
*Want to get updated on the bot? Here you can get a link!*

-***M_game***
*Play a short story*
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: So, that's it for the commands! This bot is still "WIP" so expect new features in the future!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
You found the secret command list! AAAAAA

-***M_goaway***
*Tell me to fuck off*

-***M_mom***
*Make me say a your mom joke!*

-***M_delete*** 
*Make me remove you!*

-***M_fix***
*Make me fix your files!*

-***M_comeback***
*After telling me to fuck off i can comeback*

-***yomomma***
*your mom*

-***M_game***
*Play a story*

actions.message:
You asking about the developer/programmer of mine? Well there is not much i can say. But you can check out his Youtube stuff and his Steam profile and add him if you want to talk. He is currently active on Natsuki's hangout center, if you want to talk you can also go on there.
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCN5h3uYD6XOb58G-voLlbkg?view_as=subscriber
Discord: https://discord.gg/tDzntMX
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/bossrussiansovietunion/
Save Mario: https://gamejolt.com/games/SaveMario/379557

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
In this you will be playing as Lucifer... 

Type "Continue1.1"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I walk in the club. Something weird is going on. No one is here...
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I stand there for a little while then I start hearing weird noises coming from somewhere...
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: It's sounds like it's coming from the closet.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I walk towards the closet, and open it slowly.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Type "Continue1.2"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I see a small dog, white small dog.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: "Hehe, what are you doing in here?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I hear the club's door open.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Sayori: "Hey Lucifer!"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Sayori: "Huh? That's a cute dog you got over there!"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Oh y-yeah..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki appears from behind Sayori
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "Hey! Where did you get that dog, Lucifer??"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Ehh, the dog was just sitting inside the closet chewing your Manga comics."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "What?!"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki runs to the closet and sees her ripped Manga on the floor.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natuski wipes her face with her uniform's sleeve.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: It looks like she's crying.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Are you okay, Natsuki?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Sayori peeks confused from behind me and looks at Natsuki.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki rushes out of the room with tears running down her face.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Type "Continue1.3"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I hand the dog to Sayori.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Then I go quickly after Natsuki.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: While I walk out of the club I pass by Yuri and Monika.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "Hey, Lucifer where are you going?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I stop.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Did you see Natsuki?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "I saw her run out of the school."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "What happened by the way?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "I am not sure."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I continue going after Natsuki
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I go out through the main entrance.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I can't see her anywhere.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I walk away from the school a bit.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I walk through a weird alley behind a shop that is north from my school.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I see a pink haired girl sitting against a wall.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Natsuki?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: She doesn't react and keeps sobbing.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I sit down next to her.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "What is wrong, Natsuki?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "I-I just can't go on anymore..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "I j-jus-just can't..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "My mom... Left me and my father..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "And my d-da..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki: "Never mind..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I help Natsuki up.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: We go back to school.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: We enter the club.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "You two are back!"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Natsuki disappears into the closet.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "Lucifer what happened?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "I don't know, it looks like she is going through hard times..."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "I see, okay then let's wrap it up for today."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Later that day in the evening me and Monika are sitting in a bar.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "Lucifer."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Hmmmm?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "Natsuki... She acted weird today, much different than always."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Yeah, she wasn't herself today."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: After an hour or so me and Monika are walking past Natsuki's house.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: After a while I notice that Monika is stopped and is looking at Natsuki's house.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "I wonder what is Natsuki up to."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Yeah... Me too."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: A man walks out of the house, he throws a piece of plastic into the garden.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: A car comes by, the man walks toward the car and gets in.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: The car drives away.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "That was her dad!"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Monika: "Maybe we could now go and check on Natsuki?"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Lucifer: "Alright, let's do it then."
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Type "Continue 1.4"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: A continuation will be in a modification for DDLC.
actions.name: Send Message
